data.name: DeleteError.Text
data.value:
You can't delete this item, as you have already placed it inline the post body.
Please remove the '[attachment]{0}[/attachment]' part of the post body and try again.

data.name: plAttachments.Help
data.value: Any uploads completed for this session or previously terminated sessions, are listed below. You can delete an uploaded file, by selecting it from the list and click the delete button.

data.name: plInline.Help
data.value: Any uploaded image file, can be placed inline the post body, exactly where you want it. Place the cursor where you want the uploaded image to appear and click the 'Place Inline' link. NOTE:All inline placed images will be automatically reduced in size to the forum maximum allowed dimentions.

data.name: MaxFileSize.Text
data.value: The uploaded item must be smaller than

data.name: plUpload.Help
data.value: Select the file you want to upload to the website.
